document_data.mainbody:
lminsters Candlekeep Companion is a sourcebook by Justice Arman, Anthony Joyce, Trevor Armstrong, M.T. Black, Jeremy Forbing, Laura Hirsbrunner, and Ed Greenwood, published independently through Dungeon Masters Guild and set in the  using the  5-edition ruleset. It focuses on Candlekeep on the Sword Coast.
